amendment.description: To provide for a classified annex to be submitted with the report on the cooperation of the United States and Israel with respect to countering unmanned aerial systems.

vote.text: Amendment SA 98 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 98 proposed by Senator Menendez for Senator Risch to Amendment SA 97. (consideration: CR S830; text: CR S830) To provide for a classified annex to be submitted with the report on the cooperation of the United States and Israel with respect to countering unmanned aerial systems.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 98 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 98 proposed by Senator Menendez for Senator Risch to Amendment SA 97.
